14.0: The rich man's wealth is like a fortress that will save him from moments of troubles even though he is not wise; and “the poor” i.e., the heartless, their poverty will ruin them.

22.0: “Truth – the word is missing: books of truth: acquire (them) and do not sell (them).”

9.0: "אשת חיל מי ימצא (Who can find a woman of worth):" "חיל" (worth) means wealth, as in a woman who acquires wealth and possessions through her wisdom. Who can find such a woman?
9.1: "מכרה (her price):" Derived from "תמכרו" (you will sell) from "תמכרו מאתם" (you will sell from among you).
